problem_summary_simple: Find the lexicographically largest string by looping, reversing, and splitting concatenated strings.
problem_summary_technical: Concatenate strings (with optional reversal), then iterate through all possible split points and reversed versions to find the max.
key_insights: The problem involves exploring many combinations of reversals and split points.
Pre-calculating the best version of each string (original or reversed) simplifies the loop.
The final comparison needs to consider all possible cut points in the looped string.
